requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5300 / Ryzen 3 5300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 5500 / RX 550 / GTX 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will probably run on most devices that have at least an integrated GPU.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 6600 / RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: WIll run good on most devices that have a non-integrated GPU.
